message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Let's split this 90/10.  You can take the smaller share, and I'll let you make the next offer.
Let's split it 60/40, that sounds fair to me.
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to come down a bit.  Let's split this 70/30.  I'm confident I can get a better deal in the next round if you don't take this one.
I'm willing to compromise, 55/45 is a good deal considering the inflation.
Bob, you're starting to feel the pinch of inflation. I'm offering 60/40 again, which is a fair compromise. Let's end this before the money becomes worthless for you.
